text: Lucien Dehoux (1890 - 16 November 1964) was a Belgian gymnast. He competed in the men's team, Swedish system event at the 1920 Summer Olympics, winning the bronze medal. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Belgian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Belgium Category:Gymnasts at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Belgium Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Sportspeople from Brussels
title: Lucien Dehoux
